name: Rainbow Sheep Lost in Space
description:
While lost in space, Rainbow Sheep finds out that Sharol The Killer Whale is depriving the world of color. To defeat Sharol, and restore color to the world, Rainbow Sheep must journey across the great unknown... 

This is a Flappy-Bird like game using gravity to avoid obstacles, and defeat Sharol. 

Report any bugs or ask questions to brdn.ark@gmail.com
